name: Fundamental Mechanics X0/l
description:
Fundamental Mechanics 52+20, 2019-2020. Series of miniature animations made on a mediocre iPhone using the Instagram stories feature while researching 16th century visual culture. Based on 16th century alchemy emblema.

The rotating tree in this FM features in the 2014 video work 'The Poisson’s Equation'. https://youtu.be/-2d0QaNERU8

https://alexandracrouwers.com | https://instagram.com/alexa_crwrs | twitter @acrwrs
